text:
@realDonaldTrump Really? So their reward is finding out you are ok with Russia putting bounties on them!!! You are garbage. I think you are the one spreading COVID-19 at your rallies.
I find it a little strange people who come in contact with you get the virus 🦠 but you don’t? 🤔 https://t.co/3cAGF5MZkM
